description: Throws an error initially but succeeds on retry, useful for testing retry logic and error recovery.

inputs.name: value
inputs.description: The value to return after healing.

inputs.name: failCount
inputs.description: Number of times to fail before succeeding (default: 1).

inputs.name: errorMessage
inputs.description: Custom error message to throw during failures.

outputs.name: result
outputs.description: The input value after the node has healed.
